headline: Shelf-Stable Food Stocks Q4 In Review: Post (NYSE:POST) Vs Peers
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q4 behind us, let’s have a look at Post (NYSE:POST) and its peers.
